title: AccountService.0.91.1
description: This is the schema definition for the Account Service.  It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to the actual list of accounts.
specification: This resource shall be used to represent a management account service for a Redfish implementation.

AuthFailureLoggingThreshold.description: The number of authorization failures that need to occur before the failure attempt is logged to the manager log.
AuthFailureLoggingThreshold.specification: This property shall reference the threshold for when an authorization failure is logged.  This represents a modulo function value, thus the failure shall be logged every nth occurrence where n represents the value of this property.

MinPasswordLength.description: The minumum password length for this service.
MinPasswordLength.specification: This property shall reference the minimum password length that the implementation will allow a password to be set to

Accounts.description: Link to a collection of ManagerAccounts
Accounts.specification: This property shall reference a resource of type Collection with a MemberType of ManagerAccount.

links.description: The links array contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.
